name: Hemraj Pant
bio: Passionate about technology and community building, empowering teams to create real-world impact.
fullBio:
Hemraj Pant serves as the Coordinator of Nepal Tek Community, bringing passion and dedication to building a thriving tech community at NCIT. With a strong focus on technology and community building, Hemraj has been instrumental in organizing numerous events and workshops that have helped students grow their technical skills.

His leadership style emphasizes collaboration, innovation, and creating opportunities for students to learn and network with industry professionals. Under his coordination, the community has grown significantly and has become a vital part of the tech ecosystem at NCIT.

Hemraj believes in empowering teams and individuals to create real-world impact through technology. He is committed to fostering an environment where students can explore their interests, develop their skills, and contribute to meaningful projects.
achievements: Led the organization of 10+ technical workshops
Built partnerships with AWS Cloud Club Nepal
Coordinated VS Code Dev Days Nepal 2025
Mentored 100+ students in their tech journey

name: Birat Aryal
bio: Exploring the realm of technology while leading, guiding, and empowering teams.
fullBio:
Birat Aryal is the Tech Lead of Nepal Tek Community, bringing technical expertise and leadership to guide the community's technical initiatives. His passion for exploring new technologies and sharing knowledge has made him an invaluable asset to the team.

As Tech Lead, Birat oversees the technical aspects of all community projects and events, ensuring that members receive quality technical guidance and support. He is particularly interested in modern web development, cloud technologies, and AI-powered development tools.

Birat's approach to leadership focuses on empowering team members to take ownership of their learning journey while providing the guidance they need to succeed. He regularly conducts code reviews, technical workshops, and one-on-one mentoring sessions.
achievements: Conducted workshops on VS Code and GitHub Copilot
Built multiple open-source projects for the community

name: Subash Singh Dhami
bio: Driving community growth while exploring real-world software engineering challenges.
fullBio:
Subash Singh Dhami serves as the Event Coordinator for Nepal Tek Community, bringing creativity and organizational skills to every event. His ability to manage complex logistics while maintaining a focus on attendee experience has resulted in numerous successful events.

With a passion for both software engineering and community engagement, Subash ensures that every event provides value to participants through hands-on learning, networking opportunities, and practical skill development.

His experience in real-world software engineering allows him to design events that bridge the gap between academic learning and industry requirements, preparing students for successful careers in technology.
achievements: Coordinated AWS Cloud Workshop with 80+ attendees
Developed event feedback and improvement systems

name: Niraj Bhusal
bio: Dedicated to keeping things organized and fostering collaboration in tech communities.
fullBio:
Niraj Bhusal serves as the Secretary of Nepal Tek Community, ensuring smooth operations and effective communication across all community activities. His organizational skills and attention to detail keep the team running efficiently.

As Secretary, Niraj maintains records, manages communications, and ensures that all team members are aligned with community goals and initiatives. He plays a crucial role in documenting events, maintaining attendance records, and coordinating between different team members.

His dedication to fostering collaboration has helped create a supportive environment where all members feel valued and heard. Niraj believes in the power of organization and clear communication to achieve community goals.
achievements: Maintained comprehensive records of all community activities
Coordinated team meetings and planning sessions
Developed documentation systems for the community

name: Aakriti Dahal
fullBio:
Aakriti Dahal leads the Public Relations efforts for Nepal Tek Community, focusing on building relationships with stakeholders, promoting events, and growing the community's visibility. Her communication skills and networking abilities have been instrumental in expanding the community's reach.

As PR Lead, Aakriti manages social media presence, coordinates with media partners, and builds relationships with industry professionals and other tech communities. Her efforts have significantly increased community engagement and participation in events.

She believes in the power of learning and growing together, and works to create an inclusive environment where everyone feels welcome to participate and contribute to the community.

name: Dinesh Shakya
bio: Passionate civil engineering student focused on structures, construction, and green sustainable practices, with a strong interest in IT and technology to drive innovative solutions.
fullBio:
Dinesh Shakya brings a unique perspective to Nepal Tek Community as a civil engineering student with a strong passion for technology. His interdisciplinary approach combines structural engineering knowledge with IT skills to explore innovative solutions.

His interest in sustainable practices and green technology aligns with the community's vision of using technology for positive impact. Dinesh actively participates in community projects that bridge the gap between civil engineering and information technology.

He is particularly interested in how technology can be applied to construction, infrastructure management, and sustainable development initiatives.
achievements: Participated in community workshops and events

name: Anamika Aryal
bio: Eager to learn anything related to tech.
fullBio:
Anamika Aryal is an Executive Member of Nepal Tek Community with an insatiable curiosity for all things tech. Her enthusiasm for learning and willingness to explore new technologies make her a valuable team member.

She actively participates in workshops, hackathons, and community projects, always eager to expand her knowledge and skills. Her positive attitude and collaborative spirit contribute to the welcoming atmosphere of the community.

Anamika believes in continuous learning and encourages fellow community members to explore diverse areas of technology without fear of failure.
achievements: Organized study groups for community members

name: Anisha Swarnkar
bio: Passionate about connecting peoples, ideas, and opportunities in technology
fullBio:
Anisha Swarnkar is an Executive Member who excels at building bridges between people, ideas, and opportunities within the tech community. Her networking skills and genuine interest in helping others succeed make her an invaluable connector.

She actively works to create opportunities for community members to collaborate on projects, attend industry events, and connect with professionals in the field. Her efforts have resulted in numerous mentorship relationships and collaboration opportunities.

Anisha believes that the strength of any community lies in its connections, and she works tirelessly to ensure that every member has access to the resources and relationships they need to thrive.
achievements: Built partnerships with local tech companies

name: Gaurav Joshi
bio: Passionate about automation and embedded systems, creating efficient hardware-software solutions.
fullBio:
Gaurav Joshi is an Executive Member with a deep passion for automation and embedded systems. His expertise in creating efficient hardware-software solutions brings a unique technical dimension to the community.

He regularly conducts workshops on IoT, embedded systems, and automation, helping students understand the practical applications of these technologies. His projects often demonstrate how software can interact with hardware to create intelligent systems.

Gaurav is committed to making embedded systems and automation accessible to all students, regardless of their background, through hands-on demonstrations and beginner-friendly explanations.
achievements: Built multiple IoT projects for demonstrations
Developed automation solutions for community use
